name: Richard Robert
description: my name is Richard robert am new here looking for a life partner,i am loving, caring , romantic. for age i do not care about age cos it is just a figure and cannot determine true love .I am also a one woman man with a lot of passion for my partner …I believe we can make good friends and maybe it can end up being sumthing we never expected,I don’t think distance will be a barrier ,as what matters is the feelings we will have for each other,thank you,
